Jam - API

Packages
jam Root package for the Jam software package.
jam.applet Applet classes(?).
jam.data Contains classes for representing histograms, gate conditions and scalers.
jam.data.control Dialogs for manipulating histograms, gates, scalers, real-time monitors, and data parameters.
jam.data.func Specific implementations of CalibrationFunction for giving energy calibrations of one-dimensional histograms.
jam.data.peaks  
jam.fit Contains classes for parametric fitting of 1-dimensional histograms.
jam.global Classes containing application status information and useful methods that any class in Jam may use.
jam.io Contains classes for storing histograms and/or gates and scalers to files.
jam.io.hdf Pure Java implementation to store histograms, gates, and scalers in the HDF 4.1 format.
jam.plot Classes for controlling the representation of the plots portion of Jam's display.
jam.sort Classes for controlling the retrieval, sorting and storage of data, including the user-extensible jam.sort.SortRoutine.
jam.sort.stream Customizable classes defining the data format to be sorted.
jam.util A few useful classes for performing some common tasks, such as opening file dialogs, formatting numbers and String manipulation.
